entity_index.value: A leading research university located in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Founded in 1861, MIT has been a significant force in scientific advancement, consistently pioneering breakthroughs across various fields. Its history includes significant contributions to the development of the field of electrical engineering and computer science.

A city in Massachusetts, known for its historical significance and a hub for innovation and education. MIT's location in Cambridge places it within a vibrant ecosystem of academic institutions and technological businesses.
